short_description: 【33 Tools All-in-One】This multitool combines 33 essential functions in one, including needlenose pliers, regular pliers, wire cutter, knife, serrated blade, bottle opener, can opener, leather punch, scissors, saw, metal file, wire stripper, luminous strip, ruler, 7/8/10/14mm hex wrench, pocket clip, phillips screwdriver, slotted screwdriver, and matching bits. From outdoor survival to home repairs, it can handle every task with ease, making it a reliable partner for you to tackle unexpected situations.

【Convenient Design】The built-in self-locking mechanism secures deployed tools in place, preventing accidental retraction and boosting safety; the integrated strip glows faintly in dark environments, making the multitool easy to locate quickly; the pocket clip lets you attach the tool to pockets, belts, or bags for instant access.

【Durable Nylon Pouch】The tool comes with a nylon sheath featuring a separate elastic pocket at the front for storing extra screwdriver bits. The sheath can slide over belts or backpack straps for easy carrying. The multitool folds down to palm size, fitting neatly into the sheath and taking up minimal space in backpacks or tool kits.
